类 Control

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.constants.Control
public class Control extends Object
The Control class provides constants and utility methods for managing the application's state, user data, and resources.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static boolean
    firstTimeOpen

    The current version of the game.

    panel_index
    Index of the current panel being displayed.
    static int
    userIndex
    Index of the currently active user.
    static ArrayList<User>
    users
    List of registered users.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getAllUsers

      public static void getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the "Users" folder. Users are added to the users list. If the folder does not exist, it will be created. Only valid user files with the ".ptpuser" extension are loaded.

    • getResourceInput

      public static BufferedInputStream getResourceInput(String path)
      Retrieves a resource from the application's classpath as a BufferedInputStream.
      参数:
      path - the relative path to the resource
      返回:
      a BufferedInputStream for reading the resource
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - if the resource cannot be found
